amendment.description: An amendment No. 61 printed in House Report 113-170 to prevent funds from being used to reduce strategic delivery systems and ensures that the President is in compliance with the Arms Control and Disarmament Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 61 printed in House Report 113-170 to prevent funds from being used to reduce strategic delivery systems and ensures that the President is in compliance with the Arms Control and Disarmament Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Turner amendment (A055) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Turner amendment (A055) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A055) offered by Mr. Turner.
